Go to the next slide    Go to the previous slide       CDS  With the ongoing efforts to curb the spread of COVID-19 in Illinois, many upcoming Student Affairs events have been cancelled or postponed for the next couple of weeks. We want to remind you to look at UIC's website and social media for any updates in regards to the university and COVID-19.              Go to the next slide    Go to the previous slide       Follow UIClife to stay updated on Student Affairs departments and any changes to events, programs, or registration deadlines.             UIC Life -  NEWS EVENTS & GIVEAWAYS             SPOTLIGHT : ACADEMIC & RESIDENTIAL COMPLEX  On January 16th, UIC and our private partner, American Campus Communities, broke ground on Harrison Hall, a 10 story, 550 bed residence hall opening Fall 2019. Harrison Hall will connect to a new 50,000 square foot academic space with several classrooms, including a 258-seat lecture center, as well as a cafe. Harrison Hall is targeting LEED Gold certification.  Click here to view live stream   Learn More
